title: Keycloak 24.0.3 released
content: To download the release go to .   UPGRADING  Before upgrading refer to for a complete list of changes.   ALL RESOLVED ISSUES   ENHANCEMENTS   * Keycloak and MSAD: enabling account in MSAD does not propagate to Keycloak    ldap   BUGS   * Cannot disable LDAP-backed user if importEnabled=false ldap  * Failed authentication: java.lang.NullPointerException: Cannot invoke    "org.keycloak.models.UserModel.getFederationLink()" because "this.delegate"    is null identity-brokering  * Update user makes User ID changes when federationLink and LDAP_ID is not set    properly admin/api  * The false option of the pkceMethod init parameter for the JavaScript adapter    is ignored adapter/javascript  * Missing permission to read configmaps in `keycloak-operator-role` operator
